name: Rube Goldberg Machine (jx1279)
description: A simple Rube Goldberg Machine, created in Unity without coding, using only the physics engine. I was inspired by the way the ball bounced to relate the game to sports in some manner, so I chose to theme the machine around soccer. Various contraptions and other balls activate a seesaw, which knocks a soccer ball into the air. I chose to add a goal for the soccer ball to go into at the end, to drive the theme home.
